I think this is a class library issue.
Moving to platform text for further investigation.

By the logs, it looks like you're using gij/gcj, but with a pre-3.1 release of
eclipse (before 3.1 final?).  Is this eclipse from eclipse.org or from Red Hat?

Can you try with a commercial VM to see if this is a gij issue?

Waiting for more details / steps to reproduce.
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-text-home/development/bug-incomplete.htm

(In reply to comment #3)
> Waiting for more details / steps to reproduce.
>
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-text-home/development/bug-incomplete.htm

I changed the JRE to 1.4.2 and now it doesn't crash as often as before, but I
had one crash yesterday, although I don't know exactly what happened, because
the logs didn't give me the exact reason.

So as far as I'm concerned, you can close the bug.

Thanks
